item.description: 1 Basic principles Detection of coherent seismic signals is an interesting topic in seismology. However, it’s difficult to identify these coherent signals with single station because of the low signal to noise ratios (SNRs). Based on the array processing techniques in radial astronomy, radar and acoustics, the seismic array methods have been developed well in the past several decades.
